contest-event.event-date: Sept. 29, 1928 D National Championship of Great Britain (Crystal Palace) National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) 1 Test Piece Contest National Championship of Great Britain (Finals) national-finals-championship-section European Championships The current Nationals contest began in 1900, but there was a previous 'Nationals' contest run 40 years earlier: Enderby Jackson's Great National Contest. Championship A Moorside Suite Crystal Palace (Concert Hall), Crystal Palace Park, Sydenham, County of London, England, UK Prizes: 1st: 50 Pounds plus the 1000 Guinea Trophy 2nd: 45 Pounds plus the Daily Telegraph Challenge Cup 3rd: 40 Pounds 4th: 35 Pounds 5th: 30 Pounds 6th: 10 Pounds May 17, 2010, 11:50 a.m. Aug. 28, 2013, 1:33 p.m. 1 Black Dyke Band William Halliwell 2 Westoe Band William Halliwell 3 Carlisle St. Stephens Band William Lowes 4 Fodens Band William Halliwell 5 Callenders Cableworks Band Tom Morgan 6 Creswell Colliery Band J. A. Greenwood Unknown Result Metropolitan Works (Birmingham) George Henry Wilson Unknown Result Marsden Colliery J. A.
